articles.title: Al Pacino and Noor Alfallah Had a Baby - The Cut
articles.description: The newest elder dad of Hollywood is 83-year-old Al Pacino, who welcomed a new child with his 29-year-old partner, Noor Alfallah. The couple named their baby Roman — presumably after the ancient empire, not Succession’s most oedipal son.
